Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Merchiston Residence in Edinburgh (Merchiston), you'll be convenient to King's Theatre and Edinburgh International Conference Centre. This 4-star apartment is close to Murrayfield Stadium and Edinburgh Castle.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 8 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. 37-inch flat-screen televisions and iPod docking stations are provided, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Merchiston Residence in Edinburgh (Merchiston), you'll be convenient to King's Theatre and Edinburgh International Conference Centre. This 4-star apartment is close to Murrayfield Stadium and Edinburgh Castle.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

King's Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Tynecastle Stadium - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Edinburgh International Conference Centre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Royal Lyceum Theatre - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Usher Hall - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
The Meadows - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Carlton Cricket Club - 1.5 km / 1 mi
St. Mary's Episcopal Cathederal - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Royal Scots Regimental Museum - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
National War Museum - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Murrayfield Stadium - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Edinburgh Castle - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
University of Edinburgh - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
George Square - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Greyfriar's Bobby - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi

The preferred airport for Merchiston Residence is Edinburgh (EDI) - 9.6 km / 6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
